Verses: 1 eppiraayeemudaiya Veriyarin Perumaiyaana Kreedaththukku Aiyo, Madhubaanaththaal Mayakkamadaindhavargalin Sezhippaana Pallaththaakkudaiya Kodumudiyinmelulla Alangaara Jodippu Vaadippogum Pushpame!

2 idho, Thraaniyum Vallamaiyumudaiya Oruvan Aandavaridaththil Irukkiraan; Avan Kalmazhaippolavum, Sangaarap Pusalpolavum, Puranduvarugira Peruvellampolavum Vandhu, Kaiyinaale Adhaith Tharaiyil Thallividuvaan.
3 eppiraayeemudaiya Veriyarin Kreedam Kaalaal Midhiththuppodappadum.

4 sezhippaana Pallaththaakkudaiya Kodumudiyinmelulla Alangaara Jodippaagiya Vaadiya Pushpam, Paruvakaalaththukkumun Pazhuththadhum Kaangiravan Paarththu, Adhu Than Kaiyil Irukkumpodhe Vizhungugiradhumaana Mudhal Kaniyaippola Irukkum.
5 akkaalaththile Senaigalin Karththar Thamadhu Janaththil Meedhiyaanavargalukku Magimaiyaana Kreedamaagavum, Alangaaramaana Mudiyaagavum,
6 nyaayam Visaarikka Utkaarugiravanukku Nyaayaththin Aaviyaagavum, Yuththaththai Adhin Vaasalmattum Thiruppugiravargalin Paraakkiramamaagavum Iruppaar.

7 aanaalum Ivargalum Dhraatcharasaththaal Mayangi, Madhubaanaththaal Vazhithappippogiraargal; Aasaariyanum Theerkkadharisiyum Madhubaanaththaal Madhimayangi, Dhraatcharasaththaal Vizhungappattu, Saaraayaththinaal Vazhithappi, Theerkkadharisanaththil Mosampoi, Nyaayantheerkkiradhil Idarugiraargal,
8 pojanapeedangalellaam Vaandhiyinaalum Asuththaththinaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu; Suththamaana Idamillai.
9 avar Yaarukku Arivaip Podhippaar? Yaarukku Ubadhesaththai Unarththuvaar? Paalmarandhavargalukkum, Mulai Marakkappannappattavargalukkume.
10 karpanaiyinmel Karpanaiyum, Karpanaiyinmel Karpanaiyum, Pramaanaththinmel Pramaanamum, Pramaanaththinmel Pramaanamum, Inge Konjamum Ange Konjamumaam Engiraargal.
11 pariyaasa Udhadugalinaalum Anniyabaashaiyinaalum Indha Janaththode Pesuvaar.
12 idhuve Neengal Ilaiththavanai Ilaippaarappannaththakka Ilaippaarudhal; Idhuve Aarudhal Endru Avargalode Avar Sonnaalum Ketkamaattom Engiraargal.

13 aadhalaal Avargal Poi, Pinnittu Vizhundhu, Norungumpadikkum, Sikkundu Pidipadumpadikkum, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avargalukkuk Karpanaiyinmel Karpanaiyum Karpanaiyinmel Karpanaiyum Pramaanaththinmel Pramaanamum Pramaanaththinmel Pramaanamum Inge Konjamum Ange Konjamumaaga Irukkum.
14 aagaiyaal Erusalemilulla Indha Janaththai Aalugira Nindhanaikkaarare, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

15 neengal: Maranaththode Udanpadikkaiyum Paadhaalaththode Oppandhamum Panninom; Vaadhai Peruvellamaaip Puranduvandhaalum Engalai Anugaadhu; Naangal Poiyai Engalukku Adaikkalamaakki, Maayaiyin Maraivile Vandhu Adaindhomengireergale.

16 aadhalaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhaavadhu: Idho, Asthibaaramaaga Oru Kallai Naan Seeyonile Vaikkiren; Adhu Pareetchikkappattadhum, Vilaiyerappetradhum, Thida Asthibaaramulladhumaana Moolaikkallaayirukkum; Visuvaasikkiravan Padharaan.
17 naan Nyaayaththai Noolum, Needhiyaith Thookkunoolumaaga Vaippen; Poi Ennum Adaikkalaththaik Kalmazhai Azhiththuvidum; Maraividaththai Jalappravaagam Adiththukkondupogum.
18 neengal Maranaththodu Seydha Udanpadikkai Virudhaavaagi, Neengal Paadhaalaththodu Seydha Oppandham Nirkaadhepom; Vaadhai Puranduvarumpodhu Adhinkeezh Midhikkappaduveergal.
19 adhu Puranduvandhamaaththiraththil Ungalai Adiththukkondupom; Adhu Naaldhorum Iravumpagalum Puranduvarum; Adhaippatrip Pirakkuncheydhiyaik Ketpadhum Sanjalaththai Undaakkum.
20 kaal Neettap Padukkaiyin Neelam Podhaadhu; Moodikkollap Porvaiyin Agalamum Podhaadhu.

21 karththar Thamadhu Kiriyaiyaagiya Aboorvamaana Kiriyaiyai Seyyavum, Thamadhu Velaiyaagiya Aboorvamaana Velaiyai Niraivetravum, Avar Peraadhseem Malaiyile Ezhumbinadhupola Ezhumbi, Kibiyonin Pallaththaakkil Kobankondadhupola Kobankolvaar.

22 ippozhudhum Ungal Kattugal Balaththuppogaadhapadikkup Pariyaasampannaadhirungal; Dhesam Anaiththinmelum Nirnayikkappatta Sangaaraththin Seydhiyai Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavaraale Kelvippattirukkiren.
23 sevikoduththu En Saththaththaik Kelungal; Naan Solvadhaik Gavaniththuk Kelungal.
24 uzhugiravan Vidhaikkiradharkaaga Naaldhorum Uzhugiradhundo? Than Nilaththaik Koththi Naaldhorum Parambadikkiradhu Undo?

25 avan Adhai Melaaga Niravinapinbu, Adhadharketra Idaththil Ulundhaith Theliththu, Seeragaththaith Thoovi, Mudhaltharamaana Kodhumaiyaiyum Therindhukonda Vaarkodhumaiyaiyum Kambaiyum Vidhaikkiraan Allavo?
26 avanudaiya Dhevan Avanai Nandraaip Podhiththu, Avanai Unarththugiraar.
27 ulundhu Thoolaththaale Poradikkappadugiradhillai; Seeragaththinmel Vandilin Urulai Sutra Vidappadugiradhumillai; Ulundhu Kolinaalum Seeragam Milaatrinaalum Adikkappadum.
28 appaththukku Dhaaniyam Idikkappadum; Idaividaamal Avan Adhaip Poradikkiradhillai; Avan Than Vandilin Urulaiyaal Adhai Nasukkugiradhumillai, Than Kudhiraigalaal Adhai Norukkugiradhumillai.
29 idhuvum Senaigalin Karththaraale Undaagiradhu; Avar Aalosanaiyil Aachchariyamaanavar, Seyalil Magaththuvamaanavar.
